title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 430 - UTILIZATION REVIEW FOR FOSTER CARE AND PREVENTIVE SERVICES

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20, 34, 153, 153-d, 153-e, 371, 372-b, 374, 374-a, 374-b, 378-a, 378[a] [2], [5], 383-c, 384, 395, 398-a, 398-b, 409-a, 409-e, 450, 453; Family Court Act, art. 10-A, §

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
